simlib.analysis.peptide.compute_secondary_structure¶

simlib.analysis.peptide.compute_secondary_structure(structure_or_trajectory, executable='stride')[source]¶

Compute the secondary structure for simlib.Structure() or simlib.Trajectory().

Parameters

  • structure_or_trajectory (Structure or Trajectory) – An instance of Structure or Trajectory

  • executable (str) – Path to STRIDE executable.

Returns

The secondary structure for the object.

Return type

SecondaryStructure
